name: Taskeer Holdings Limited
description: Provider of financial solutions intended to facilitate traditional monthly group savings. The company's platform enables monthly collections that contribute to facilitating money-saving concepts, taking into consideration any challenges and constraints, enabling consumers to get assurance of quality standards, trusted members and accurate receiving dates.
